column4: quick question, will 32bit version of ubuntu work with 8 gigs of ram?  and will it be able to address all 8gigs?
yes and no ~ 3gig only ~ go for 64bit
how is hte box adressing the current 4 gigs than?
MustardCU, AFAIK it is depending on motherboard. i have a ASUS that give me 3.15 out of 6.
